content: Should web-public be hyphenated? Weâ€™re currently inconsistent.
Yeah, I'd say it always should be. "A web-public stream"; "This stream is web-public".
I guess the user docs and the Streams menu currently have a space, but I'd be fine with changing it.
I don't have strong feelings on this. I generally don't produce hyphenated terms like this, but I think you're probably right that English expects one to spell it that way.
